org.ranksys.core.preference

Interface PointWisePreferenceData<U,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Superinterfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, PreferenceData<U,I>, UserIndex<U>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FastPointWisePreferenceData<U,I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleFastPreferenceData, TransposedPreferenceData

    public interface PointWisePreferenceData<U,I>
extends PreferenceData<U,I>
    Point-wise preference data. In some cases it is necessary to access a particular user-item pair.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (Saul.Vargas@mendeley.com)
